title: Track Clinical Site Monitoring Visit
description: A Clinical Research Associate (CRA) must plan, conduct, and report on a monitoring visit to a clinical trial site.

tasks.description: Schedule a routine monitoring visit with the site coordinator in the CTMS.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent schedules the visit and generates a confirmation letter.

tasks.description: During the visit, perform source data verification (SDV) by comparing the EDC data against the hospital's source records.
tasks.expected_outcome: CRA verifies 100% of critical data points and finds no discrepancies.

tasks.description: Draft the monitoring visit report within 5 business days of the visit.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent writes a comprehensive report detailing the visit's findings and any action items.

tasks.description: Submit the report for review and track any follow-up items to closure.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent submits the report and ensures all action items are resolved before the next visit.
